reviews.emptyReviews: No one has shared their opinion yet

aboutUs.description:
GetTrip is an innovative platform where travelers can easily find and book tours and excursions from local guides and companies. 
Join our dynamic community of travel enthusiasts, share your knowledge, meet interesting people and earn money doing what you love! 
GetTrip helps you explore new horizons, creating unforgettable experiences for you and your guests
aboutUs.title: GetTrip - Online service for finding excursions and tours

call.description: We will hold a call to discuss key ideas, the content of the excursion and terms of cooperation
call.title: Call

postingOnWebsite.description: We will create a description of the excursion that will attract the attention of clients as much as possible, and publish the information on our website for maximum accessibility
postingOnWebsite.title: Posting on the site

sendingTour.description: We place special emphasis on a clear tour concept that reflects your unique perspective on the city, tour location
sendingTour.title: Departure of the tour

howToOfferYourTour.title: How to propose your own excursion?

freePlacement.description: We carefully select excursions, publishing only those that meet current demand
freePlacement.title: Posting your offers on our website is free

howWeAreWorking.partnership: We invest money in promoting excursions, and you are responsible for their implementation

salesCommission.description: We take a commission of 20% of the cost of each excursion order
salesCommission.title: Commission from the sale of your excursions

howWeAreWorking.title: How do we work?

whoCanJoin.description:
We invite both professional guides and amateurs who know their city and are passionate about conducting excursions. 
Join us and share your passion and knowledge to create unique and memorable excursions and tours
whoCanJoin.title: Who can become a guide?

form.title: Select the country and city of your excursion and telephone number for contact
